title: Feature request
body:
Hey Guys/Gals,

a suggested feature (or 5) which I think would improve the platform without being a massive coding exercise.

1 - a heart beat option - to ping check a game before jumping into one (perhaps a 30 second game traffic simulation if the server load is high - maybe a graph to see variance)

2 - In the shop could we see some useless stats (like total RP bought/IP accrued/totals spent)

3 - I'd really like to be able to browse all the skins I own on a single page too

4 - The ability to alter video/audio settings from the main interface before entering a game would be handy.

5 - Something we can do with excess IP (maybe to donate to friends)

Hopefully there's something there worth looking at doing

(moved as per a suggestion from another summoner - sorry for the seeming spam)

So, they've still got to earn it in the first place. It's like a job, should be allowed to give you money to whomever you want.
